name: Way to Purify
description:
This game is the Final Project of our Game 106 Class. We tried our best to complete it in the time given, so we were in a rush while finishing it. It may have some minor bugs because of this. It also has a How-to-Play text document with the game folder. Hope we can come to you with better games in the future. Love you all, stay safe . ♥

Developers:

  • Onur Bilge
  • İsmail Hakkı Can Eyüpoğlu
